email_body: Andy: Sorry...I was on vacation last week and fell behind my email. Anytime you want to talk is fine. I'll be around today if it works for you. john Andy Zipper@ENRON 06/16/2000 11:48 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: options and other stuff john, I'd like the chance to review some assumptions re: options manager ( yes, we are still on schedule) with you as well as discuss some other issues related to putting Enron's prices on other platforms. some time on monday would work best for me. Let me know. andy
